description.message: Remove everything from the new tab page while keeping your theme background, or use any image, GIF, or video as a custom wallpaper.

select_background_notification.message: To change the settings of a particular background, first select it in the "Backgrounds" section.

set_background_as_current_notification.message: To make a background current, first select it in the "Backgrounds" section.

unable_to_load_background_of_local_theme.message: Automatic loading of the background from a locally installed theme is not supported. To load it manually, click the "View theme background" button, in the newly opened tab, right-click the image and select "Copy image" from the context menu. Next, go to the Clear New Tab settings page and paste the copied image into the "Paste image or its link" field.

download_img_when_link_given_label_text.message: Download image when a link is provided

automatically_set_last_uploaded_backgrou.message: Automatically set the last uploaded background as the current one.

color_of_area_around_background_label_te.message: Color of the area around the background

home_btn_is_visible_label_text.message: Show "Home" button in the new tab page

paste_btn_is_visible_label_text.message: Add "Paste" button to the "Paste image or its link" input

allow_downloading_img_by_link_label_text.message: Allow downloading an image when a link is pasted into the 'Paste image or its link' field

enable_video_repeat_label_text.message: Enable the ability to repeat video backgrounds

always_use_alarms_api_to_change_backgrou.message: Always use the Alarms API to change background in slideshow mode

show_item_developer_info_in_tooltip_labe.message: Show developer info of background/task in tooltip

update_database_when_dnd_item_label_text.message: Update the database when dragging and dropping a background or task

paste_background_text_btn_title.message: Paste image or its link from clipboard

stretch_browser_option_text.message: Stretch to fit the browser window

install_help_chrome_text.message: Thank you for installing Clear New Tab! If you have a theme installed from the Chrome Web Store, please wait until its background appears in the "Backgrounds" section, then open a new tab to see it. Otherwise, you can upload your own background using the form below. If you need help, click on the ? buttons or watch the video guide. Click to hide this message.

install_help_edge_text.message: Thank you for installing Clear New Tab! If you have a theme installed from the Edge Add-ons store, please wait until its background appears in the "Backgrounds" section, then open a new tab to see it. Otherwise, you can upload your own background using the form below. If you need help, click on the ? buttons or watch the video guide. Click to hide this message.

install_help_firefox_text.message: [text is not updated!] Thank you for installing Clear New Tab! You can install a theme from the Chrome Web Store or upload your own background with the form below. If you need help on how to use the extension click on ? buttons or watch the video guide. Click to hide this message.

restore_help_text.message: Here, you can download and restore a backup of your Clear New Tab data. The backup includes all Clear New Tab data, such as your backgrounds and custom HTML/CSS/JS. If the total data size exceeds the limit set in the "Size of one backup file (bytes)" input (400 MB by default), the backup will be split into multiple files. You can restore a backup by uploading all files at once. If you encounter any issues, you can upload the files in batches or individually, starting with "Part 1".

scheduler_help_text.message:
Here you can create tasks. A "task" refers to a planned event that determines when a particular background will appear in the new tab, scheduled for a specific date and time. To create a task, click on a background from the "Backgrounds" section, select your desired date and time, and then click the "Add new task" button. It's not necessary to specify a complete date; you can choose a date with any level of specificity. If you don't provide a one-time exact date, the task will be set to repeat on a regular basis. Omitting "Time" will cause the task to run at 12:00:00 AM on the specified date. The "Time" field uses a 24-hour format.

Examples:
March 2, 2023 13:00:00 - the task will execute once on March 2, 2023, at 13:00:00, after which it will be removed from the list.
March 2 - the task will run annually on March 2 at 00:00:00.
March - the task will run every year on March 1 at 00:00:00.
2 (day of the month) - the task will run on the 2nd of every month at 00:00:00.
Wednesday - the task will run every Wednesday at 00:00:00.
13:00:00 - the task will run daily at 1:00:00 PM.

Tasks can be reordered by dragging them. If two tasks are scheduled to run simultaneously, the task located further down the list will take precedence. For instance, if you have a task scheduled to run every Sunday and another set for December 25, 2022, you will need to move the "Christmas" task below the "Sunday" task to see the "Christmas" background instead of the usual "Sunday" background.

The minimum interval between tasks is 1 minute.

custom_code_help_text.message: Here you can put custom HTML/CSS/JS for the new tab page. The code here will not remove the functionality of backgrounds. To make links work add target="_top" to the tag. Example: Microsoft.

upload_background_help_text.message:
You can upload multiple files simultaneously. When using the "Browse" button, select all the files you wish to upload before clicking "Open". If you prefer drag and drop, ensure you've selected multiple files before dragging them.

Supported formats: PNG, JPG, GIF, MP4, WebM, OGG.

paste_background_help_text.message:
You can paste a direct link to an image or an image from your clipboard into this field. To obtain a direct link, right-click on the image and select "Open image in new tab" from the context menu. Then, go to the opened tab and copy the link from the address bar. To copy an image to your clipboard, right-click on it and choose "Copy image" from the context menu. Please note that GIF animation will not be preserved when pasting an image from the clipboard; however, it will be preserved if you paste a direct link.

Supported formats: PNG, JPG, GIF.

mode_chrome_help_text.message:
Theme background: When this mode is selected, the backgrounds of themes you install from the Chrome Web Store will be automatically downloaded and displayed in the new tab. In this mode, there is no need to upload your own backgrounds. If you have uploaded your own backgrounds, you can switch to the "One background", "Multiple backgrounds", or "Scheduled" modes.

One background: In this mode, the new tab will display one of the backgrounds you uploaded, which you have designated as the current background in the "Current background number" field. Use this mode if you want to see one of your uploaded backgrounds in the new tab.

Multiple backgrounds: In this mode, the new tab will showcase one of the uploaded backgrounds, changing it at a specified interval. If you want a different background for each new tab, set the "Change background every" option to "Instant (new background per tab)". Use this mode if you wish to cycle through all your uploaded backgrounds. Please note that this mode does not guarantee specific backgrounds will appear on certain dates. For instance, if you want particular backgrounds to display on each day of the week, use the "Scheduled" mode.

Random solid color: When this mode is selected, the new tab will display a randomly chosen color, changing at a specified interval.

Scheduled: In this mode, the new tab will display specific background(s) at the date and time you select. Use this mode if you want specific background(s) to appear at precise times.

mode_edge_help_text.message:
Theme background: When this mode is selected, the backgrounds of themes you install from the Edge Add-ons store will be automatically downloaded and displayed in the new tab. In this mode, there is no need to upload your own backgrounds. If you have uploaded your own backgrounds, you can switch to the "One background", "Multiple backgrounds", or "Scheduled" modes.

One background: In this mode, the new tab will display one of the backgrounds you uploaded, which you have designated as the current background in the "Current background number" field. Use this mode if you want to see one of your uploaded backgrounds in the new tab.

Multiple backgrounds: In this mode, the new tab will showcase one of the uploaded backgrounds, changing it at a specified interval. If you want a different background for each new tab, set the "Change background every" option to "Instant (new background per tab)". Use this mode if you wish to cycle through all your uploaded backgrounds. Please note that this mode does not guarantee specific backgrounds will appear on certain dates. For instance, if you want a particular background to display on each day of the week, use the "Scheduled" mode.

Random solid color: When this mode is selected, the new tab will display a randomly chosen color, changing at a specified interval.

Scheduled: In this mode, the new tab will display specific background(s) at the date and time you select. Use this mode if you want specific background(s) to appear at precise times.

slideshow_help_text.message: When this option is enabled, the background will dynamically change on new tab pages that have already been opened. If the option is disabled, the background on previously opened new tab pages will remain unchanged, even if the current background has been updated.

settings_context_help_text.message:
This setting determines the scope of all other settings in this section, which include: "Background size", "Background position", "Background repeat", "Color of the area around the background", "Video speed", and "Video volume".

If "Global" is selected, these settings apply to all backgrounds.

If "Selected background" is chosen, they apply only to the background selected in the "Backgrounds" section. To select a background, click on it. Once chosen, the "Settings context" will automatically switch to "Selected background", confirming the background selection. In this context, each setting will also offer the option to use the "Global" value.

background_size_help_text.message:
Don't resize:
Keep the original size of the background.

Cover the screen/browser window:
Resize the background to cover the entire screen/browser window, even if parts are cropped at the edges.

Fit to the screen/browser window:
Resize the background so that the entire image is fully visible within the screen/browser window, leaving empty space at the edges if necessary.

Stretch to fit the screen/browser window:
Resize the background to the maximum width and height of the screen/browser window, without preserving its aspect ratio.

If the background in your installed theme appears too large or small, and you want it to fill the screen without leaving empty space, selecting "Cover the screen" is recommended.

background_position_help_text.message: This setting allows you to adjust the background's position within the browser window, functioning similarly to the CSS property background-position.

background_repeat_help_text.message: This setting allows you to infinitely duplicate the background along the Y and/or X-axis, functioning similarly to the CSS property background-repeat.

color_of_area_around_background_group_he.message: In addition to its main function, this setting (in the global settings context) determines the color displayed before any background is loaded when you open a new tab. To eliminate the 'white flash,' set this value to a darker color.

video_speed_group_help_text.message: This setting allows you to control the video playback speed. A value of 1.0 represents "normal speed". Values lower than 1.0 slow down the playback, while higher values increase the speed. The minimum value is 0 (video will not play), and the maximum value is 16.

one_backup_file_size_in_bytes_help_text.message:
This setting allows you to adjust the size of the files into which the backup will be split. If Clear New Tab crashes during the backup download, you may try to lower this value.

Minimum value: 52428800 bytes (50 MB).
Maximum value: 419430400 bytes (400 MB).

home_btn_is_visible_help_text.message: Displays a "Home" button on the new tab page that directs you to the default new tab page.

empty_new_tab_page_link_text.message: üìÑ Empty New Tab Page - a lighter version of Clear New Tab

go_to_home_page_title.message: Go to default new tab page
